review: Dr Shubham is an extremely patient doctor who takes the time to explain the different facets of the health issue in addition to the targeted treatment. He is also easily available on phone and always replies immediately which is very calming for the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Shubham is one of the most patient doctors I have ever seen. He always gets into the root cause of the issue and recommends the treatment. I consulted him due to high fever which after the diagnosis came out to be Typhoid. He recommended some medicines and I managed to recover completely within 2 weeks. He also shared some useful tips for post recovery period.

When I met Dr Shubham mishra, I was in very tense about my health, because I suffer severe pain in chest, but Dr Shubham council me very nice way and I feel relex immediately and got completely relief after the 15 days medical therapy. Thank you Dr Shubham mishra.
